nodes.text: The Fleet Support Branch was one of the four organizational arms of the Imperial Navy, consisting of those officers responsible for maintenance and engineering duties. It was divided into two main divisions; the Engineering Division, which was responsible for maintaining a ship's sublight and hyperspace engines, and also for the structural integrity of their hulls, and Technical Services, which was charged with looking after power distribution, life-support and other specialities that were outside of the Engineering Division's remit.

In 3 ABY, Commander Brandei, serving in the role of Technical Services Officer aboard the Super Star Destroyer Executor, was responsible for ensuring the readiness of the ship's TIE Fighter squadrons.
